title: This Morning fans creeped out over story of adopted 6 year old accused of being 'sinister' adult
text:

This Morning fans got more than they bargained for as they tuned into the show on Monday morning, with a story that gave them the chills - while some fans weren't entirely sure they believed the tale.

Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield introduced a guest on the show from Indianapolis via video link, who revealed his story that was very familiar to the plot of 2009 horror movie Orphan.

Michael Barnett appeared live on air to relive the moment he and estranged wife Kristine adopted a six-year-old girl named Natalia, who he claims turned out to be an adult.

Natalia was born with spondyloepimetaphyseal dysplasia, a bone disorder that would prevent her from growing taller than three feet.

Michael told the hosts that he and his then wife soon became suspicious that their adopted daughter was much older than they were told, before things took a "sinister" turn.

(Image: ITV)

He claimed that they discovered she had adult teeth and had full pubic hair, and that medical tests and a later court ruling revealed she was in fact 22, and not a child.

Both Natalia and her biological mother continue to deny the claims, while when approached by This Morning neither commented.

While she's said to be a teenager now, Michael believes she is in fact a 30 year old - with her now reportedly living with a new family.

(Image: Kristine Barnett)

Michael told Holly and Phil that Natalia had been acting oddly as soon as they adopted her, but it was what happened later on that left them horrified.

He claimed one night he awoke to find his daughter stood over his bed clutching a knife with a "blank expression" on her face.

Not only that, but he alleges she also threatened to harm his other children and would apparently hide knives under her bed.

(Image: ITV)

He also claimed she told him "coldly and directly" that she was trying to kill his sons.

Michael told the hosts that in three separate court appearances, Natalia was "ruled as a fully grown adult", while her biological mother continues to claim she was a child when adopted.

Viewers were pretty horrified by the story on the show, more because it mirrored the plot of a terrifying horror film released a decade ago.

(Image: ITV)

Taking to Twitter , fans compared it to the movie Orphan with one fan tweeting: "Oh my god this story on #ThisMorning is so creepy how close it is to the movie “orphan”."

Another tweeted: "This is actually very scary ngl imagine adopting a 6 year old yet it's an adult and then they try killing you."

A third added: "Oh my god the story on #ThisMorning the movie Orphan came true!! The only only movie that’s ever gave me nightmares. So creepy."

A fourth said: "This adoption story is the most bizarre thing I’ve ever heard."

This Morning continues weekdays and Sundays at 10:30am on ITV.
description: This Morning fans were left a little creeped out over an unusual story which was very familiar to the plot of horror film Orphan
